1042932890554781698.text:
The Families Act would:
✔️Secure our borders
✔️Enforce our immigration laws
✔️Maintain reasonable asylum standards
✔️Keep asylum-seeking families together
https://t.co/xzg6vcDLOR

1042865982719451136.text: The Families Act addresses family separations by overriding the court decision that has produced the current lose-lose situation and by providing the resources to expeditiously adjudicate asylum claims. https://t.co/LYxvohJ7xC

1042839558792962048.text: The Families Act is a narrowly tailored solution to a lose-lose situation when it comes to keeping families together at the border. https://t.co/xzg6vcVmGp

1042825143515574273.text: I hope all my colleagues on the committee – Democrat and Republican – will continue to work with me in good faith to advance a bill that finds common ground and a workable alternative to the unacceptable status quo.

1042825141091266561.text: The Families Act addresses this specific problem by overriding the court decision that has produced the current lose-lose situation and by providing the resources to expeditiously adjudicate asylum claims.

1042825138406875136.text: They can either enforce the law, which practically requires children to be separated from parents, or they must revert to a policy of ‘catch and release.’

1042825135995215872.text: In dealing with families illegally crossing the border, our broken #immigration system leaves law enforcement with only two options — both of them bad.
